com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm
Class MultiFactorHJM

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
MultiFactorModel
public class MultiFactorHJM
extends java.lang.Object
implements MultiFactorModel

An implementation of MultiFactorModel providing the Heath Jarrow Morton / Musiela model for evolution of interest rates

Author:
Luigi Sgro

Method Detail

nextCurve

public Curve nextCurve(Curve currentCurve,
                       double[] randomVector,
                       double timeStep)
Description copied from interface: MultiFactorModel
Based on a current status of the underlying and a vector from a suitable distribution, calculates a next step of the underlying

Specified by:
nextCurve in interface MultiFactorModel
Parameters:
currentCurve - The current curve representing a state of the underlying today
randomVector - The vector to drive the evolution to the next state of the underlying
timeStep - The fraction of year from one state to the next
Returns:
A new curve representing a next state of the underlying

getDimension

public int getDimension()
Specified by:
getDimension in interface MultiFactorModel
Returns:
The dimension of the model, i.e. the dimension of randomVector to be provided
